column4: Hi guys,  I've tried to update to the latest ubuntu and my system crashed It didn't finish the install and now I can't install/update anythin and when doing apt-get install it gives me this error apt-get: error while loading shared libraries: libapt-pkg.so.4.12: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
What can I do to finish the update , or to downgrade, reinstall is not yet an option
why is reinstall not an option?
